alert.note: Alert for Craig; Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 2:39AM CST until February 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed wintry precipitation expected, which could be heavy at times during the day both Wednesday and Thursday, including a few isolated thunderstorms. Total sleet accumulation up to one inch with ice accumulations of one to two tenths to of an inch * WHERE...Craig and Ottawa Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads may deteriorate quickly during the mid to late morning and become slick and hazardous, which could impact the morning or evening commute. Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 1-844-465-4997 or go to okRoads.org.
